item.title: Libby’s 20 Most Popular Books of September
item.description: There's a friendship with a giant octopus, a midwife mystery in 1789 Maine, Percival Everett's 2024 multi-award-winning satire, and more.

item.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for October 9, 2025
item.description: A gothic Southern thriller, the coziest house on the block, a deadly witch hunt in 17-century England, and more of today's best book deals

item.title: And the Nobel Prize in Literature Goes To…
item.description: The winner of the 2025 Nobel Prize in Literature has been announced, Canada's Giller Prize shortlisted books, a lit Swift faux pas, and more.

item.title: Here are the 2025 Lambda Literary Award Winners
item.description: Here are the winners of the 2025 Lambda Literary Awards in all 26 categories, as well as the winners of eight special awards.

item.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
item.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.
